Item.name: Pipe Rifle
Item.description: A makeshift weapon constructed from various machine parts. Crude but effective in a pinch.

Item.name: Pipe Rifle Physicorium Round
Item.aliases: pipe_rifle_alien_round, pipe rifle alien round, pipe alien round, pipe_alien_round, alien pipe round, alien piperound, pipe round alien, piperound alien

Item.name: Revolver Flare
Item.description: Waterproof revolver flare that illuminates a small area.

Item.name: Handgun
Item.description: Compact 9mm handgun issued to private outpost and vessel security forces, though intended for use against hostile crewmen it is at least some form of defence against the horrors waiting in the depths.

Item.name: 9mm Magazine (High-Capacity)
Item.aliases: handgun high-capacity mag, handgun_mag_extended, handgun mag extended, 9mm_magazine_extended, 9mm_magazine_high_capacity

Item.name: Physicorium 9mm Magazine
Item.aliases: handgun alien mag, handgun physicorium mag, handgun_alien_mag, Physicorium_9mm_magazine

Item.name: Marine SMG
Item.description: An advanced military SMG developed by the Europan Coalition for ship and outpost defence. Fires 5.7x28mm self-propelled supercavitating rounds quite effective at taking out unarmored creatures.

Item.name: 5.7x28mm Magazine
Item.description: Coalition 5.7x28mm

Item.name: Physicorium 5.7x28mm Magazine
Item.aliases: smg alien mag, smg physicorium mag,smg_alien_mag, Physicorium_5.7x28mm_magazine
Item.description: Coalition 5.7x28mm

Item.name: 5.7x28mm Magazine (Riot)
Item.description: Coalition 5.7x28mm

Item.name: Torpedo Rifle
Item.description: An advanced submarine recoiless rifle developed for use against vessels and heavily armored monsters, fires high-explosive microtorpedoes with considerable range.

Item.name: Microtorpedo (Slug)
Item.aliases: microtorpedo slug, torpedo rifle round slug, torpedo_rifle_round_slug
Item.description: Miniaturized dumbfire kinetic slug, launched from a torpedo rifle.

Item.name: Microtorpedo
Item.description: Miniaturized dumbfire warhead, launched from a torpedo rifle.

Item.name: Microtorpedo (Short Fuse)
Item.aliases: microtorpedo shortfuse, torpedo rifle round short fuse, torpedo_rifle_round_short_fuse
Item.description: Miniaturized delayed-fuse warhead, launched from a torpedo rifle.

Item.name: Microtorpedo (Shock Pulse)
Item.aliases: microtorpedo shockpulse, torpedo rifle round tazer, torpedo_rifle_round_tazer
Item.description: Miniaturized stun probe, launched from a torpedo rifle.

Item.name: Microtorpedo (Physicorium)
Item.aliases: microtorpedo physicorium, torpedo rifle round physicorium, torpedo_rifle_round_physicorium, microtorpedo alien, microtorpedo_alien
Item.description: Experimental high-yeild warhead, launched from a torpedo rifle.

Item.name: Flare Gun
Item.description: An emergency flare gun intended for signaling ships. Fires flare shells to provide illumination.

Item.name: Flare Cartridge
Item.aliases: flare_cartridge, flare shot, flare_shot, flare round, flare_round
Item.description: Waterproof signal flare that illuminates a large area. Fired from a flare gun.

Item.name: Impact Mine
Item.description: Advanced contact-triggered buoyant mine. Sensors armed 3 seconds after deploying.

Item.name: Proximity Mine
Item.description: Advanced motion-triggered buoyant mine. Sensors armed 3 seconds after deploying.

Item.name: Double-barrel Shotgun
Item.aliases: double barrel shotgun, double_barrel_shotgun, shorty, ek_double_shotgun
Item.description: Short double-barrel shotgun. Favored by coalition watchmen as a cheap but effective weapon.

Item.name: Tactical Shotgun
Item.description: Coalition standard tube-fed shotgun. Holds 5 shells.

Item.name: 12-Gauge Shell
Item.description: Buckshot ammunition for a shotgun.

Item.name: Beanbag Shell
Item.description: Beanbag ammunition for a shotgun. Single-projectile, less-lethal.

Item.name: Shotgun Slug
Item.description: Slug ammunition for a shotgun. Single-projectile effective against armored targets.

Item.name: Shotgun Hollow-Point Slug
Item.description: Hollow-point slug ammunition for a shotgun. Single-projectile effective against soft targets.

Item.name: Physicorium Slug
Item.description: Physicorium slug ammunition for a shotgun. Single-projectile effective against armored targets.

Item.name: Shotgun Grenade
Item.description: Grenade ammunition for a shotgun. Direct-fire grenade which detonates on impact.

Item.name: Shotgun Flechette
Item.description: Flechette ammunition for a shotgun. Tight grouping of metal flechettes effective against soft targets.

Item.name: Tazer Gun
Item.description: Delivers an electrical shock that is in most ways comparable to a stun baton, but without its somewhat lacking range.

Item.name: Flamethrower
Item.description: Propels a stream of ignited fuel to produce an intense fireball capable of covering a large area.

Item.name: Flamethrower Fuel Tank
Item.aliases: flamer fuel, flamer_fuel, flamethrower fuel, flamethrower_fuel

Item.name: Flamethrower Incendium Tank
Item.aliases: flamer fuel incendium, flamer_fuel_incendium, flamethrower fuel incendium, flamethrower_fuel_incendium

Item.name: Molotov Cocktail
Item.description: A bottle of ethanol with a soaked bandage wick, a crude but effective incendiary device.

Item.name: Micro Dart Gun
Item.description: A small hand-operated dart gun often used by renegade assassins.

Item.name: Dart Gun
Item.description: A compact gas-operated dart gun for administering medicines and other chemicals.

Item.name: Dart (Explosive)
Item.description: A gruesome device which injects a miniature explosive probe that detonates after a moderate delay.

Item.name: Compact SMG
Item.description: A simple 10mm SMG for ship and outpost defence, inaccurate and eats through ammo but gets the job done.

Item.name: 10mm-Auto Magazine
Item.aliases: compact smg mag, mini smg mag, mini_smg_mag, 10mm mag, 10mm_magazine

Item.name: Physicorium 10mm-Auto Magazine
Item.aliases: compact smg alien mag, mini smg alien mag, mini_smg_alien_mag, 10mm alien mag, 10mm_magazine_physicorium

Item.name: 10mm-Auto Magazine (Riot)
Item.aliases: compact smg riot mag, mini smg riot mag, mini_smg_riot_mag, 10mm mag riot, 10mm_magazine_riot

Item.name: Marine Rocket Launcher
Item.aliases: marine_rocket_launcher,marine_rpg,marine rpg,rocket_launcher,rocketlauncher,rocket launcher,ek rocketlauncher,ek rocket launcher,rpg,ek rpg
Item.description: Heavy marine shoulder-fired launcher developed for coalition special operations, unwieldy and expensive but packs a punch.

Item.name: Rocket (High Explosive)
Item.aliases: rocket,he rocket,rocket he,he_rocket,rocket_he,rocket high explosive,rocket explosive,rocket_explosive
Item.description: Dumbfire rocket with a substantial explosive warhead.

Item.name: Rocket (Short Fuse)
Item.description: Delayed-fuse rocket with a substantial explosive warhead.

Item.name: Rocket (Armor Piercing)
Item.description: Dumbfire rocket with an armor piercing warhead.

Item.name: Rocket (Physicorium)
Item.description: Dumbfire rocket with an experimental high-yeild warhead.

Item.name: Gauss Pistol
Item.description: Fulgurium weapon, utilizes magnetic coils to propel metal slugs at great speeds. Requires charging periodically.

Item.name: Gauss Rifle
Item.description: Fulgurium weapon, utilizes magnetic coils to propel metal slugs at great speeds. Requires charging periodically.

Item.name: Drum LMG
Item.description: Heavy automatic weapon firing 5.56x45mm parabellum rounds with supreme sustained fire capability.

Item.name: 5.56x45mm Drum
Item.description: 5.56x45mm Machine-Gun Parabellum

Item.name: Physicorium 5.56x45mm Drum
Item.aliases: drum lmg alien mag,lmg alien mag,lmg alien drum,lmg drum alien

Item.name: Marine Battle Rifle
Item.description: A standard Europan Coalition 5.56x45mm long-gun, both accurate and reliable. Favored by europan mercenary companies everywhere.

Item.name: 5.56x45mm Magazine
Item.aliases: battle rifle mag,assault rifle mag,marine battle rifle mag,marine assault rifle mag
Item.description: Coalition 5.56x45mm

Item.name: Physicorium 5.56x45mm Magazine
Item.aliases: battle rifle alien mag,assault rifle alien mag,marine battle rifle alien mag,marine assault rifle alien mag
Item.description: Coalition 5.56x45mm

Item.name: 5.56x45mm Magazine (Riot)
Item.aliases: battle rifle riot mag,assault rifle riot mag,marine battle rifle riot mag,marine assault rifle riot mag
Item.description: Coalition 5.56x45mm

Item.name: 'Beast' SSL
Item.description: An experimental 30mm-FC autocannon for massive portable firepower.

Item.name: 30mm-FC Clip
Item.aliases: 30mm fc clip,ssl mag,ssl clip,beast mag,beast clip
Item.description: 30mm composite SSL clip. Used by the experimental 'Beast' man-portable SSL.

Item.name: Improvised Explosive
Item.description: A makeshift shrapnel bomb constructed from loose electronics and a fuel tank.

Item.name: Breaching Charge
Item.description: Lightweight shaped-charge device with a small area of effect. Useful for breaching doors and thin hull sections.

Item.name: Satchel Charge (UEX)
Item.description: Timer controlled explosive pack.

Item.name: Satchel Charge (C-4)
Item.description: Timer controlled explosive pack.

Item.name: Satchel Charge (Thermite)
Item.description: Timer controlled explosive pack.

Item.name: Laser Pistol
Item.description: Pulse-amplified laser weapon. Designed to run off specialized high-power battery cells.

Item.name: Laser Rifle
Item.description: Pulse-amplified laser weapon. Designed to run off specialized high-power battery cells.

Item.name: Flamethrower Hypergolic Tank
Item.description: Unstable self-oxidising fuel mixture, usable underwater.

Item.name: Dynamite
Item.description: An early 'stable' explosive compound made from common organic chemicals. (Use while in-hand to light)

Item.name: Satchel Charge (Dynamite)
Item.description: Timer controlled explosive pack.

Item.name: .357 Revolver
Item.description: Vintage pattern single-action revolver, a favorite among captains with a flair for the dramatic.

Item.name: Rocket Harpoon
Item.description: A harpoon for the harpoon gun, propelled by a small rocket motor for increased range and impact.

Item.name: Diving Grenade
Item.description: A neutral-buoyancy grenade designed for underwater use. Has a faster detonation fuse than a standard grenade.
